languages.text: "Ваша Светлость полна сюрпризов". {n}Фалько с трудом сдерживает ухмылку, кивая в сторону тела Джай.{/n} "Позвольте без лишних прелюдий — ваше время слишком ценно, и я не смею тратить его больше необходимого. Вы знаете, зачем я здесь: Меркатум. Табула. Официале".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость полна сюрпризов". {n}Фалько с трудом сдерживает ухмылку, кивая в сторону тела Джай.{/n} "Позвольте без лишних прелюдий — ваше время слишком ценно, и я не смею тратить его больше необходимого. Вы знаете, зачем я здесь: Меркатум. Табула. Официале".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

languages.text: “大人，您真是充满了惊喜。”{n}法尔科朝婕伊的尸体点了点头，几乎无法掩饰脸上得意的笑容。{/n}“多余的话我就不说了，您的时间实在是太宝贵了，我不敢继续浪费您的时间。您也知道我这么做是为了什么——帝国官方行商执照。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

traits.locale_text: “大人，您真是充满了惊喜。”{n}法尔科朝婕伊的尸体点了点头，几乎无法掩饰脸上得意的笑容。{/n}“多余的话我就不说了，您的时间实在是太宝贵了，我不敢继续浪费您的时间。您也知道我这么做是为了什么——帝国官方行商执照。”

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ist voller Überraschungen." {n}Falco kann nur mit Mühe ein Grinsen zurückhalten, als er in Richtung Jaes Leiche nickt.{/n} "Überspringen wir das Vorspiel. Eure Zeit ist zu kostbar und ich wage es nicht, mehr als nötig davon zu vergeuden. Ihr wisst, warum ich hier bin. Drei Wörter: Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ist voller Überraschungen." {n}Falco kann nur mit Mühe ein Grinsen zurückhalten, als er in Richtung Jaes Leiche nickt.{/n} "Überspringen wir das Vorspiel. Eure Zeit ist zu kostbar und ich wage es nicht, mehr als nötig davon zu vergeuden. Ihr wisst, warum ich hier bin. Drei Wörter: Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

languages.text: {n}Falco ne peut réprimer un rictus en montrant le corps de Jae d'un signe de tête.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie est pleine de surprises. Inutile de tourner autour du pot. Votre temps est bien trop précieux pour que je m'amuse à vous tenir la jambe plus que nécessaire. Vous savez pourquoi je suis là : la Mercatum Tabula Officiale »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

traits.locale_text: {n}Falco ne peut réprimer un rictus en montrant le corps de Jae d'un signe de tête.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie est pleine de surprises. « Inutile de tourner autour du pot. Votre temps est bien trop précieux pour que je m'amuse à vous tenir la jambe plus que nécessaire. Vous savez pourquoi je suis là : la Mercatum Tabula Officiale »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady} es una caja de sorpresas». {n}Falco apenas contiene su sonrisa al asentir hacia el cadáver de Jae.{/n} «Vayamos al grano, que su tiempo es demasiado valioso como para desperdiciarlo conmigo. Sabe a por qué he venido. La Mercatum Tabula Officiale».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady} es una caja de sorpresas». {n}Falco apenas contiene su sonrisa al asentir hacia el cadáver de Jae.{/n} «Vayamos al grano, que su tiempo es demasiado valioso como para desperdiciarlo conmigo. Sabe a por qué he venido. La Mercatum Tabula Officiale».

languages.text: 「陛下は驚いている様ですね」{n}ファルコはジェイの遺体に向かってうなずきながらも、笑いをこらえるのがやっとのようだった。{/n}「前置きは省きましょう。あなたの貴重な時間を無駄にしてはいけない。何故私がここにいるのか、分かっているでしょう？メルカトゥム。タビュラ。オフィシャル」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下は驚いている様ですね」{n}ファルコはジェイの遺体に向かってうなずきながらも、笑いをこらえるのがやっとのようだった。{/n}「前置きは省きましょう。あなたの貴重な時間を無駄にしてはいけない。何故私がここにいるのか、分かっているでしょう？メルカトゥム。タビュラ。オフィシャル」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri yine şaşırtıyor." {n}Falco, Jae'a baş sallarken gülmemek için kendini zor tutuyor.{/n} "Merasimleri atlayalım. Senin vaktin kıymetli, bende gereğinden fazlasını almak istemem. Neden burada olduğumu. Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is full of surprises." {n}Falco can barely contain a smirk as he nods toward Jae's body.{/n} "Let's skip the prelude — your time is too valuable, and I dare not waste it any more than necessary. You know why I am here: the Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} hazretleri yine şaşırtıyor" {n}Falco, Jae'a başını sallarken gülüşüne güçlükle engel oluyor.{/n} "Merasimleri atlayalım. Senin vaktin kıymetli, bende gereğinden fazlasını almak istemem. Niye buradayım, biliyorsun. Mercatum. Tabula. Officiale."
